name: Mage Staff
description: A powerful staff imbued with arcane energy.
looks: The Mage Staff is tall and slender, made of polished oak wood. It has a crystal orb at the top that glows with a faint blue light.

special_weapon_skills.arcane_blast: Unleash a powerful blast of arcane energy.

name: Iron Sword
description: A sturdy iron sword capable of cutting through enemies with ease.
looks: The iron sword has a long, straight blade with a single cutting edge. The hilt is made of leather wrapped around the tang, and the pommel has a simple, functional design.

special_weapon_skils.swordsmanship: Increases damage and accuracy with swords.

name: Iron Helmet
description: A sturdy iron helmet that provides good protection for the head.
looks: The iron helmet is made of solid iron with a smooth surface. It has a rounded shape with a face guard that covers the lower part of the face. There are small openings for the eyes and a ventilation hole at the top.

name: Iron Helmet
description: A sturdy iron helmet that provides good protection for the head.
looks: The iron helmet is made of solid iron with a smooth surface. It has a rounded shape with a face guard that covers the lower part of the face. There are small openings for the eyes and a ventilation hole at the top.

name: Ring of Strength
description: A ring infused with the power of strength, providing a boost to the wearer's physical abilities.
looks: The Ring of Strength is made of polished gold and has a simple, elegant design. It features an engraved symbol of a clenched fist.

name: Iron Sword
description: A basic sword made of iron
looks: The iron sword has a straight blade with a single edge. The hilt is wrapped in leather for a secure grip.

special_weapon_skils.swordsmanship: Grants a bonus to Swordsmanship skill.

name: Iron Dagger
description: A small dagger made from iron.
looks: The iron dagger has a short, straight blade with a pointed tip. The hilt is made from wood and wrapped with a leather grip.

name: Steel Plate Armor
description: A heavy armor made from sturdy steel plates.
looks: The armor is made up of thick steel plates that cover the entire body, providing excellent protection. It has additional reinforcements on the chest and back, as well as on the shoulders and elbows.

name: Steel Plate Armor
description: A heavy and durable armor made from steel plates.
looks: The Steel Plate Armor consists of thick steel plates, covering the entire body. It has a menacing and imposing appearance, with engraved patterns and spikes protruding from the shoulder and chest plates.

name: Iron Helmet
description: A sturdy iron helmet that provides good protection for the head.
looks: The iron helmet is made of solid iron with a smooth surface. It has a rounded shape with a face guard that covers the lower part of the face. There are small openings for the eyes and a ventilation hole at the top.

name: Warhammer
description: A heavy two-handed hammer designed for crushing armor.
looks: The warhammer has a long wooden handle and a large iron head with a flat surface on one side and a spiked surface on the other. It is adorned with intricate engravings and has a leather grip for better handling.

name: Longsword
description: A versatile and balanced weapon that can be used with one hand. It is commonly used by knights and adventurers.
looks: The longsword has a straight blade made of polished steel, with a hilt wrapped in leather for a comfortable grip. It has a simple yet elegant design.

special_weapon_skils.swordsmanship: Grants a bonus to Swordsmanship skill when used.

name: Enchanted Amulet
description: A powerful amulet with magical properties.
looks: The amulet is made of a shining crystal, suspended on a delicate silver chain. It emits a soft glow and when held, the crystal feels warm to the touch.

name: Iron Helmet
description: A sturdy iron helmet that provides good protection for the head.
looks: The iron helmet is made of solid iron with a smooth surface. It has a rounded shape with a face guard that covers the lower part of the face. There are small openings for the eyes and a ventilation hole at the top.

name: Silver Longsword
description: A finely crafted longsword made of silver.
looks: The silver longsword has a straight blade with a sharp edge. The hilt is wrapped in leather, providing a comfortable grip. The pommel has intricate engravings of mythical creatures.

special_effects.silver_enchantment: Deals additional damage to undead and werewolves.
